About.name: Rob Sutcliffe
About.personal summary: Front-End Developer with expertise in data visualisation, full-stack development, and UI/UX design history. With a proven track record of transforming prototypes into production-ready codebases, delivering responsive data visualisations, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

achievements: Transformed prototypes into production-ready codebase and converted to TypeScript.
Created responsive data visualisations in D3.Js with animations and filtering.
Designed and developed OpenAI chat integration for dataset analysis.
Developed a visual query builder to explore market segments.
Created interactive data visualisations for target market segment reports.
Generated professional.pptx reports for marketing team presentations.
Led the development of an LMS and contributed to an internal course authoring tool.
Applied functional programming to sanitise and validate large course data.
Developed an interactive microsite commemorating The Economist's 75th anniversary.
Collaborated closely with an internal strategist to shape and refine the design concept.
Implemented responsive data visualisations and crafted bespoke, adaptable, and lightweight web animations.
Implemented functional programming for a real-time socket server.
Developed numerous reusable components with lightweight interactions.
Optimised lighthouse score to ensure cross-platform compatibility of the PWA.
Developed an observable clickstream to capture user data for AI-driven recommendations.
Implemented a robust unit testing pipeline, creating comprehensive tests and maintaining code coverage above 70%.
Consulted with high-profile clients to optimise UI customisations for their use cases.
Created customisations, widgets, and themes.
Led the international rebrand, managing the creative and technical team.
Collaborated with C-level executives and a branding agency to ensure visual style alignment.
Developed a comprehensive design system for seamless integration across multiple micro-sites.
Revamped the internal project management software architecture, transitioning it into an efficient MVC framework.
Conducted extensive research and collaborated with multiple teams to completely redesign the user interface.
Managed and delivered multiple concurrent client projects, meeting all deadlines.
Initiated and nurtured client relationships, ensuring client satisfaction and long-term partnerships.
